result.reason: This is a 2018 UI enhancement request to persist toolbar/menu bar position (e.g. bottom placement); the underlying WinForms ToolStripPanel docking persistence is non-trivial, upstream explicitly deferred it past v1.77 with no follow-up, and it has minimal engagement — not worth the implementation cost for our fork.
result.approach: Would require saving ToolStripPanel dock/location to user settings and restoring on startup; deferred as low-ROI WinForms layout persistence work.
